meanings.definition: Representing visually through images or drawings.
meanings.sent1: The picturing book had colorful illustrations on every page.
meanings.sent2: She had a picturing mind, always imagining scenes from her favorite stories.
meanings.sent3: The picturing clouds in the sky looked like fluffy animals playing.
meanings.sent4: His words painted a picturing landscape of a magical forest in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's picturing interpretation of the city skyline was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Forming a mental image or concept of something.
meanings.sent1: The picturing memory of her childhood home brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: He was picturing the perfect beach vacation in his mind.
meanings.sent3: The picturing idea of a flying car seemed both exciting and impossible.
meanings.sent4: Her words created a picturing scene of a cozy fireplace on a snowy day.
meanings.sent5: The picturing image of a field of sunflowers stayed with her long after she left.

meanings.definition: Describing or portraying something in a visual manner.
meanings.sent1: The picturing language used in the story made it come alive in my imagination.
meanings.sent2: She had a picturing way of explaining complex ideas with simple drawings.
meanings.sent3: The picturing details in the painting revealed hidden meanings to those who looked closely.
meanings.sent4: His picturing storytelling transported the listeners to a different time and place.
meanings.sent5: The picturing movie captured the essence of the book perfectly.
